channel.title: Project Pkers 718 24/7-VPS HOSTED-NO LAGG
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/73183432/ProjectPkers.png[/img]
[COLOR=#000000]First of all, Thank[/COLOR] [COLOR=#FF0000]you[/COLOR] [COLOR=#000000]for taking your time out to look at this! We are a brand new server Looking for players, We are currently in beta and seeking to find[/COLOR] [COLOR=#000000]bugs which is why we need players We are looking for a couple staff if you post on the forums![/COLOR]
[b]Website:[/b] [url=http://www.projectpkers.com]http://www.projectpkers.com[/url]
[b]Forums:[/b] [url=http://projectpkers.com/Forums/index.php]http://projectpkers.com/Forums/index.php[/url]
[b]Download:[/b] [url=http://projectpkers.com/Playnow/play_now.php]http://projectpkers.com/Playnow/play_now.php[/url]
[b]Home Of ProjectPkers[/b] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/73183432/Home%20of%20ProjectPKers.png[/img]
[b]Pictures: [/b]
[b]Training Teleports[/b] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/73183432/Training.png[/img]
[b]Boss Teleports[/b] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/73183432/PVM.png[/img]
[b]Minigames[/b] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/73183432/Minigames.png[/img]
[b]Skilling[/b] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/73183432/Skilling.png[/img]
[b]Slayer[/b] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/73183432/Slayer.png[/img]
[b]Pking Teleports[/b] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/73183432/Pking.png[/img]
[b]Features:[/b]
Dicing Community Training Locations Donator and Extreme Donator features Revenants Safe/Risk Pking 25/25 skills working 100% Gilded Altar Squeal of Fortune Money Pouch (Shop and trade Support) Clan Wars Safe and Risk portal for fun fights. Duel Arena with Staking. Glacors with fire spell weekness. Loyalty Shop FightCaves/Fight Kiln Queen Black Dragon Barrows Frost Dragons Slayer Tower with all floors (including slayer task system) Polypore Dungeon Corporeal Beast Kalphite Queen Bork Tormented Demons Godwars (Zaros/Nex, Bandos, Armadyl, Zamorak, Saradomin)
Daily/Weekly updates. Decent drop rates, also double drops weekend. Good XP rates for skilling and combat. Donator zone for our donators. Staff listens to your suggestions. and always gives helping a hand Always some people online playing. Years of experience of owning a server and coding. Community is growing bigger daily!
[b]Thank you![/b] ~[b]Tyler[/b][/CENTER]
